basic_info.description:
üëã My name is Ju Eun Heo, and I'm a developer who enjoys communicating with people and constantly striving for growth. ü§© 

 [ FrontEnd Skills ] 
 - I can create the structure and design of web pages using HTML and CSS, and perform framework-based development with React. I can also handle user input and update pages in real-time using JavaScript. Additionally, I can communicate with backend servers via RESTful APIs and dynamically load and display data.  

 [ BackEnd Skills ] 
 - I can handle interactions with databases using JAVA. With SpringBoot, I can easily handle object-oriented programming and mapping between relational databases using JPA, as well as directly interact with databases to execute SQL queries and process results using JDBC.

projects.title: Dog Stuff Shopping Mall
projects.description: FIND BY DOG is an online shopping mall website specializing in dog clothing. Customers can register desired items in their shopping carts and proceed with purchases. Over a period of two weeks, the registration page and password reset functionality were implemented using Thymeleaf, while the administrator page was developed using React and JPA. Pagination was applied to all pages to facilitate convenient viewing of lists for administrators.

projects.title: Online Shopping Mall
projects.description: iMMUTABLE is an online clothing shopping mall website. Customers can add desired products to their shopping carts and proceed to purchase selected clothing items. Within a specified timeframe, features such as email verification for password reset, user registration, integration with KakaoPay API, and FAQ management (including input, modification, and deletion) are implemented, with a clear distinction between members and administrators. Members are allowed to read FAQ items only. Additionally, a domain was purchased from Gabia and registered for AWS server deployment.

projects.title: Music Site
projects.description: AddEventListener is a music website where users can listen to music according to their preferences. It's not only about music, users can also find interviews and new songs from their favorite artists instantly. Within a month, I implemented the sign-up page and the ID/password recovery page using JDBC to directly write SQL queries. On the sign-up page, I made efforts to enhance user convenience by incorporating email verification and address lookup APIs.
